Class TradingAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.TradingAccount

  • public class TradingAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the variables relevant to a trading account Matches the Users Table table

    30/10/2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Paul King -s3449513

    • Constructor Detail

      • TradingAccount

        public TradingAccount(int userId,
                      java.lang.String name)
        This constructor will set the balance to the starting value of 1 million The number of hours active will be set to zero
        Parameters:
        userId - References the id variable in the User
        name - This is a combination of the player's first name and last name

      • TradingAccount

        public TradingAccount(int userId,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      double balance,
                      int hoursActive)
        Parameters:
        userId - References the id variable in the User
        name - This is a combination of the player's first name and last name
        balance - The balance saved in TradingAccounts database table is to be inserted here
        hoursActive - the hours in the TradingAccounts database table is to be inserted here

      • getHoursActive

        public int getHoursActive()
        Accessor

      • getBalance

        public double getBalance()
        Accessor
